sn46.18:1.1: “Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn46.18:1.2: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn46.18:1.5: yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjhanga viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn46.18:1.6: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ime satta bojjhanga araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami”ti.
